name: Ju zi
wishText: May the happyness and love always be with you! My princess! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy QiXi Festival!! May many many Happy surround You...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I know I'm meant to be where I am.And I'm gonna be by your side.
replayText: 我知道，这是命运的安排。我会一直守护在你身边。
